description:
“An Investment in knowledge always pays the best dividends." – Benjamin Franklin

Your beliefs are tied to your thoughts, which shape your feelings that create your behaviors. Your behaviors produce habits that ultimately generate your results. These results then define your life.

Is your life working out the way you want it to?

Have you noticed your negative thoughts ruining how you feel, how you act and your results in life?

Perhaps you have debt, you're burdened by your spending habits, or you're stuck in a financial rut?

Are you losing sleep because you find yourself up at night anxious and worried about your finances?

Do you feel sick and tired of the rat race?

Do you feel envious and bitter when you see people who have more than you, who are more successful than you or who are happier than you?

The external world is a reflection of your internal reality. What you think is what you will become; therefore, your mind will not allow you to become something that you view negatively.

Your mindset lays the foundation for your financial success, but it also defines the pinnacle of your success.

In less than two hours, this course shows you how to master your mindset, so that you can master your money and become financially free faster than you ever imagined.

Say goodbye to limiting beliefs and hello to the financial results you want in life.

But don't just listen to me. Here's what a few other people have said:

"Understanding your financial situation is a start, but Hahna challenges you to understand who you are financially, how you got there, what's stopping you from improving your situation and then she proceeds to give you concrete steps to take on your road to consumerism “recovery." - Steve Windsor, Bestselling Author

“This course clearly lays out some very simple, practical, easy to follow, directional advice on where to start giving yourself the freedom to control your own money effectively. I consider myself to be very financially aware. Even still, this course gives solid advice on how to direct yourself not only financially, but also emotionally when it comes to finances. I agree with one of the main motifs in the course that describe how influential having control over yourself emotionally is to mastering your finances." – Dustin, Senior Consultant

In this course you will learn:

  • What it takes to break free from the rat race, so that you can become financially free.
  • How to alter your financial and personal mindset to achieve the financial results you desire
  • How to develop your emotional intelligence in parallel with your financial intelligence, so that you can make better financial decisions
  • How to handle financial challenges and temptations to not fall back into poor financial habits.
  • How to identify your money personality, allowing you to gain greater control over your financial thoughts and behaviors.

This course is based on the #1 Amazon Bestseller, “Master Your Money: Stop Yearning, Start Earning", having close to 2000 downloads with a 4.9 out of 5 stars rating as of July 15, 2015.

Do you want to unlock your millionaire mindset and achieve the financial freedom you always desired?

If yes, take this course now!

On the go? Download the audio files and slide deck of the lectures to use at your own convenience.

Trust me, this is just a small sample of what you'll learn and by the end of this course you'll have the ingredients to unlocking your millionaire mindset.

No matter who you are, I guarantee you'll learn at least one thing from this class.

I will personally respond to any questions you may have as you go through the material, especially if you're not sure how to take all of the information and apply it to your life.

For less than $1 a day, imagine who you will become over the next year by mastering your mindset. If you want to take advantage of the initial price, I'd sign up sooner than later as I plan on raising the price in the near future.

See you inside the course!

-Hahna Kane Latonick

"Knowing is not enough, we must apply. Willing is not enough, we must do." -Bruce Lee

*DISCLAIMER: The information in this course is being provided to you for educational and informational purposes only. This course does not contain professional advice; therefore, please consult a professional for professional advice. Neither the author nor the publisher shall have any liability to any person or entity with respect to any loss or damage caused or alleged to be caused directly or indirectly in connection with this course.
title: Unlock Your Millionaire Mindset Today
